modName: better yet still hearthfire friendly marcurio
summary: make the hirable marcurio for the bee and barb look better
descriptionHtml:
hi
<br /> the point of this mod is to make that sad run down imperial hireling look fairly descent
<br />he is completely hearthfire compatible as far as i can tell
<br />
<br />so far no bugs
<br />
<br />unfortuneatley no incompatibilities have been found yet
<br />pleasse comment if you find one
<br />
<br />i hope you enjoy my first mod
author: Kurumu Asakura
